title: [综合|管理|传送]TeleportSigns——跨服木牌[1.8-1.14]
author: Royal白以殇
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Royal白以殇 于 2020-2-13 07:47 编辑 
由于原搬运者的地址已领便当(介绍借鉴了原地址请见谅！)所以我就来搬运这个插件了(水一帖)原地址
TeleportSigns功能介绍显示服务器的状态在线人数/人数上限/服务器的开启或关闭等自定义传送地点点击木牌传送到另一个服务器

配置文件仅供参考

#-----------------------------OOO-----------------------------------## TeleportSigns Configuration File ## Author, created by: montlikadani ##-----------------------------OOO-----------------------------------## [Default configuration] ## github.com/montlikadani/TeleportSigns/blob/master/config.yml ## ## [Tips] ## - If you find a bug, send here: ## https://github.com/montlikadani/TeleportSigns/issues ##-----------------------------OOO-----------------------------------#
# Optionsoptions:# Use external server as a hosted server?# If false then using internal server.external-server: true
# 将日志插入到控制台中.logconsole: true
# Sign usage time to prevent twice connect to that server.# This will be ignored with this permission: teleportsigns.use.nocooldownuse-cooldown: 5
# Sign updates time in ticks.# Example: 20 ticks = 1 secondsign-updates: 200
# How much time start the server pinging? (In seconds)ping-interval: 30
# Important! If you do not want the pinging to end ping-timeout to be smaller than one and# take the ping interval by one more.# How much time does the server pinging down? (In seconds)ping-timeout: 29
# Ignoring the player sneaking when clicking on the sign.ignore-player-sneaking: true
# Defines a background of the sign.background:enable: false
# Possible types: glass, wool, claytype: glass
# 玩家加入的服务器.servers:pvp:# 服务器IP地址和端口.address: "222.0.0.1:25566"#变量:#%numpl% = 在线玩家数量#%maxpl% = 玩家最大上限#%motd% = 好像是MOTD#%displayname% = 这个不用管#%isonline% 服务器的状态# 标志上的显示名称.displayname: "&6[&cPvP&6]"survival:# 服务器IP地址和端口.address: "222.0.0.1:25567"
# 标志上的显示名称.displayname: "&e[&aSurvival&e]"
#=========================================## Plugin Settings ##=========================================## 检查插件更新.check-update: true
# 日志记录文件插件消息.log-to-file: true
# 插件在控制台中启用/禁用消息。# 使用 %newline% 占位符。plugin-enable: '&6[&2Teleport&eSigns&6]&7 >&a The plugin successfully enabled&6 v2.3&a!'plugin-disable: '&6[&2Teleport&eSigns&6]&7 >&c The plugin successfully disabled!'
# 版本号!config-version: 5

安装方法:把插件拖入plugins文件夹然后重启/开启服务器注意是服务端的plugins文件夹不是BC端的


最重要的创建跨服木牌方法第一排: [tsigns]第二排: 服务器的名字第三排: info

原帖介绍:
Overview
This plugin is useful because servers can be divided into different signs and if you click on one of the players to teleport to the specified server.(Required a BungeeCord server)?
Features?
-APIfor developers
- Sign auto update
- Server connect timeout
- Sign usage time (in seconds), to prevent server suddenly stop, when a player tries to connect to the server twice.
- Create your own layouts
- Ignore player sneak when wants to teleport
- Create your own servers with unlimited servers
- Background sign (block is color changing), with 3 block type & color

-自动更新
-服务器连接超时
-当玩家尝试连接到服务器两次时，阻止服务器突然停止使用时间（秒）。
-创建自己的布局
-当玩家想要传送时忽略玩家潜行
-创建具有无限服务器的服务器
-背景符号（块颜色变化），3块类型和颜色

效果图:

指令:/teleportsigns (or /ts) - 插件信息/ts reload (or rl) - 重新加载配置文件/ts help - 查看相关指令/ts listservers - 列出在配置文件中可用的服务器。/ts listlayouts - 列出配置中可用的布局。/ts editsign - 在外观上编辑符号。/ts connect <server> - 连接到指定的服务器。
